name: Possession: Mansion
description:
Made for GMTK 2021. You're a ghost, useless! Escape the mansion by possessing different bodies scattered around the place.

P.S: This is our first ever Game Jam!

DESIGNER: Mew 

ARTIST: DD 

PROGRAMMER: OldBlokeGallagher "Co"
